paper.title: Planetary Phase Variations of the 55 Cancri System
paper.authors: Kane, Stephen R.; Gelino, Dawn M.; Ciardi, David R.; Dragomir, Diana; von Braun, Kaspar
paper.journal: The Astrophysical Journal, Volume 740, Issue 2, article id. 61 (2011).

paper.title: 55 Cancri: Stellar Astrophysical Parameters, a Planet in the Habitable Zone, and Implications for the Radius of a Transiting Super-Earth
